trans-unit.source: Specifies whether smoothing (antialiasing) is applied to lines and curves and the edges of filled areas.
trans-unit.target: Specifica se viene applicato l'aliasing a linee e curve e i bordi dell'area riempita.

trans-unit.source: Default, None, and HighSpeed are equivalent and specify rendering without smoothing applied.
trans-unit.target: Impostazione predefinita, None, e ad alta velocità sono equivalenti e specificano il rendering senza smussatura.

trans-unit.source: AntiAlias and HighQuality are equivalent and specify rendering with smoothing applied.
trans-unit.target: AntiAlias e riprodurre sono equivalenti e specificano il rendering con arrotondamento.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > When the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.SmoothingMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is specified by using the SmoothingMode enumeration, it does not affect text.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Quando il <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.SmoothingMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>proprietà viene specificata utilizzando l'enumerazione SmoothingMode, influisce sul testo.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.SmoothingMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: To set the text rendering quality, use the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.TextRenderingHint%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property and the <xref:System.Drawing.Text.TextRenderingHint> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Per impostare la qualità di rendering di testo, utilizzare il <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.TextRenderingHint%2A?displayProperty=fullName>proprietà e <xref:System.Drawing.Text.TextRenderingHint>enumerazione.</xref:System.Drawing.Text.TextRenderingHint> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.TextRenderingHint%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > When the<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.SmoothingMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is specified by using the SmoothingMode enumeration, it does not affect areas filled by a path gradient brush.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Quando il<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.SmoothingMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> proprietà viene specificata utilizzando l'enumerazione SmoothingMode, non si applica aree riempite con un pennello a sfumatura.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.SmoothingMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Areas filled by using a <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PathGradientBrush> object are rendered the same way (aliased) regardless of the setting for the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.SmoothingMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: Le aree riempite utilizzando un <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PathGradientBrush>dell'oggetto vengono visualizzate nello stesso modo (alias) indipendentemente dall'impostazione per il <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.SmoothingMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>proprietà.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.SmoothingMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PathGradientBrush>
Specifica per il rendering di anti-aliasing.
Specifica per il rendering di anti-aliasing.
